attributes.action: Create a fair tax system so that lower earners pay the same % of their income as high earners in tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment our tax system is grossly unfair, the top earners pay a smaller % of their income in tax than lower earners, due to the NI limit cap, why!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/WholeTaxSystem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
